item.title: Hero Destini 125 [2018-2024] On Road Price in Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Destini 125 [2018-2024] Running Cost
The Destini 125 [2018-2024] has a running cost of Rs. 2.00 per kilometer and a monthly fuel cost of Rs. 3000, assuming a daily run of 50 kilometers and Petrol at Rs. 100 per liter.
Monthly Fuel Cost Rs. 3000 / 1500km Daily Fuel Cost Rs. 100 / 50km Per KM Fuel Cost Rs. 2.00
Calculate Fuel Cost For Hero Destini 125 [2018-2024]
Choose fuel type and transmission, and enter fuel cost in your city to get the best result....]]>
